Package index

Data Exploration

Explore variables and frequencies

freq()
Frequency Table
varlist()
List Variables with Labels
metadata()
Get Variable and Value Labels Metadata

Label Management

Set, apply, export, and validate labels

set_var_label()
Set Variable Label
set_val_labels()
Set Value Labels
apply_labels()
Apply Labels from a Definition Data Frame
apply_labels_json()
Apply Labels from JSON File
export_labels()
Export Labels to CSV Format
export_labels_json()
Export Labels to JSON Format
normalize_labels()
Normalize Labels (Full-width to Half-width Conversion)
validate_labels()
Validate Labels for Prohibited Characters

SPSS Labels

Parse and apply SPSS syntax labels

parse_spss_labels()
Parse SPSS Label Syntax
apply_spss_labels()
Apply SPSS Label Syntax to Data Frame

Occupational Scales

Assign SEI/SSI from occupation codes

occ_scale()
Assign Occupational Scales (SEI/SSI)
check_occ_scale()
Check Unmatched Occupation Codes

Data Transformation

Transform and format variables

std()
Standardize a Variable
fmt()
Format Numbers with Fixed Decimal Places
quantile_group()
Divide Values into Quantile Groups
prank()
Weighted Percent Rank

Data Download

Download sample survey data

download_csrda()
Download CSRDA Sample Data
